comments.text:
Build ID: 

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b11pre) Gecko/20110131 Firefox/4.0b11pre 

STR: 

1. Open about: (can be any page, this is an example)
2. Trigger page source viewer (CTRL + U, View->Page source, context menu - right click - Page Source) 
3. Click on a href link in the source code (a css file, js, anything) 

How can you return to previous source page? 

The workaround is to use shortcuts ALT + left/right keyboard arrow. 
It would be awesome to also integrate some navigation buttons, although this will not land in Fx4, it can be a consideration for the future.
